content.raw:
I get no errors, the messages are being sent, just no response from Val.
We have not experienced the same issues with the updated controller and can get Val walking and moving her arms.
My team found an alternate solution to challenge number two that doesn't require moving Val's head,
but would it be possible to add a test script example  head_traj.py demonstrating a simple turn to the left?
content.html: I get no errors, the messages are being sent, just no response from Val. We have not experienced the same issues with the updated controller and can get Val walking and moving her arms. My team found an alternate solution to challenge number two that doesn't require moving Val's head, but would it be possible to add a test script example head_traj.py demonstrating a simple turn to the left?
